thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com
thread.title: SCOTT JACKSON
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by SCOTT JACKSON

author: SCOTT JACKSON
title: SCOTT JACKSON
text: Bought some 8 frame medium hives and they've gone together without much trouble. I did assemble a couple of boxes that had an end that was 1/8" short and was going to leave a gap between boxes, so I cut them down and built quilt boxes out of them. Solid boxes, easy to finish. Brushy Mtn. offers lots of accessory type items like slatted racks, wooden hivetop feeders, and queen castles - a big plus. The people there are very helpful, especially when I call on the phone. Will be going back for more 8 frame medium hives this spring.
